name: Gary KOZLOWSKI, Petitioner, v. CRIMINAL APPEAL/POST TRIAL UNIT OF the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS of Philadelphia County, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Kozlowski v. Criminal Appeal/Post Trial Unit of Court of Common Pleas

parties: Gary KOZLOWSKI, Petitioner, v. CRIMINAL APPEAL/POST TRIAL UNIT OF the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS of Philadelphia County, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of October, 2006, the Petition for Review and the Application for Consolidation are denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
911 A.2d 502
Gary KOZLOWSKI, Petitioner, v. CRIMINAL APPEAL/POST TRIAL UNIT OF the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS of Philadelphia County, Respondent.
No. 119 EM 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 18, 2006.
